scripts.build-mac: gulp && cd build && npm install && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=release-builds/mac
scripts.build-linux: gulp && cd build && npm install && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=release-builds/linux
scripts.build-windows: gulp && cd build && npm install && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out=release-builds/windows
